page.title: 10Leisure
page.content: Much leisure time is now spent within the home, television being the main source of entertainment. Films have become available on video and many shops have opened in our area where people can hire a film on tape for a night or two and watch it at home on their own machine. Local theatre is now totally amateur, and all local cinemas have either closed down or become bingo halls. Denton has a new swimming pool but Hyde's has closed as it was old and unsafe. There are snooker halls,karate and judo clubs,and several health and fitness centres. Several local cricket clubs play in weekend leagues and Hyde United football team play in a senior professional league.Many local public houses provide live entertainment especially at weekends.
